actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for the appointment of a Special Prosecutor by Judge John J. Sirica of the U.S. District Court for the District of Columbia, to investigate and prosecute any offense with respect to the election in 1972 for the Office of President.

summary.text: States that Judge John J. Sirica of the United States District Court for the District of Columbia or his successon shall appoint a Special Prosecutor who shall investigate and prosecute offenses arising out of the 1972 Presidential election campaign. Grants the Special Prosecutor authority to undertake any action he deems necessary to carry out his duties under this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the appointment of a Special Prosecutor by Judge John J. Sirica of the U.S. District Court for the District of Columbia, to investigate and prosecute any offense with respect to the election in 1972 for the Office of President.
